mapper.select: select notice_id, project_id, notice_title, notice_content, notice_regdate, notice_hitnum, notice_enabled from notice where notice_id = #{noticeId} order by notice_regdate desc
select file_id, related_id, file_name, file_type, file_data from files where related_id = #{noticeId}
select count(*) from notice where notice_enabled = 1
mapper.update: update notice set notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, notice_content = #{noticeContent}, notice_update_date = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmddhh24miss'), notice_update_mid = #{memberId} where notice_id = #{noticeId}
